overview:
Gordon King is a founder and managing PArtner of Fuse Fincaial Services.

FuseFinancial works with start-ups and mid-market companies to put the missing pieces in place. FUSE offers capital raising/financing, business development and management consulting services to the Technology, Energy, Consumer Products & Services and Real Estate sectors. The team of directors and advisors have over 100 years of experience structuring transactions. Our clients retain us to address the following issues:

Debt or Equity Financing Restructuring Sales Facilitation / Business Development Strategic Alliances Partnering Programs
